name: @arista/purs-backend-es
description: A modern ECMAScript optimizing backend for PureScript

scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run test:output-diff
scripts.version: echo 'export const version = "v'$npm_package_version'";' > ./src/Version.js && git add ./src/Version.js && git commit -m 'Bump purs-backend-es version ($npm_package_version)' && git tag 'purs-backend-es-v$npm_package_version'
scripts.test:output-diff: npm run build && cd ../ && ./backend-es/index.js build --int-tags --output-dir=output-es2 && diff -r output-es output-es2 && rm -r output-es2
scripts.build: cd .. && spago build -u '-g corefn,js' && node ./backend-es/index.dev.js bundle-module -m Main --int-tags --platform=node --minify --to=./backend-es/bundle/index.js

author: Arista Networks
